text: Gegeneophis madhavai, the Mudur caecilian, is a species of caecilian found in India. It is only known from its type locality Mudur village, Kundapura Taluk in Udupi district in Karnataka. ==References== madhavai Category:Endemic fauna of India Category:Fauna of Karnataka Category:Amphibians of India Category:Amphibians described in 2004
title: Gegeneophis madhavai
